attributes.action: Save Danielle aka Amy Mitchell aka Ronnie Mitchells daughter
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On the 2nd of April 2009 Ronnie Mitchell finally found out that Danielle is her daughter but due to a twist of fate she gets run over by Janine just as she is about to go to her new found Mother 

join if your tired of the depressing storylines in Eastenders and help make a difference.

SAVE A SOAPLIFE TODAY WITH JUST A CLICK

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
